info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 2:31AM PST until March 05 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau, Northwest Deserts and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Nevada, Northeast Clark County and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Through 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will create hazardous boating conditions across Lake Mead and Lake Mohave which could capsize small craft. 1 to 3 foot waves are forecast over the open waters.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
